job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.

jd: From: Barla Santosh, Gacsol sbarla@gacsol.com Reply to: sbarla@gacsol.com Title: Full Stack Java DeveloperLocation: WHIPPANY NJ (onsite)Client note:Looking overall 12+ years and 4+ years in reactExperience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud). 1. Full Stack Development:Spring, Spark, Java, REST Services, AWS• Design, develop, and maintain high-performance and scalable web applications using Java technologies.• Implement both front-end and back-end components to ensure seamless user experiences.2. Front-end Development:• Develop responsive and user-friendly interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks (e.g., Angular, React, or Vue.js).• Collaborate with UX/UI designers to implement visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces.3. Back-end Development:• Design and implement server-side logic using Java technologies (e.g., Spring Boot).• Develop RESTful APIs to facilitate seamless communication between front-end and back-end systems.4. Database Management:• Design and optimize database schemas.• Implement data storage solutions using relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) or NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB).5. Code Optimization and Performance Tuning:• Identify and address performance bottlenecks in the application.• Optimize code for maximum speed and scalability.6. Testing and Debugging:• Write unit tests and conduct thorough debugging to ensure the reliability and stability of the application.• Collaborate with quality assurance teams to perform testing and ensure the delivery of high-quality software.7. Collaboration:• Work closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, UX/UI designers, and other developers, to deliver quality software solutions.• Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality and ensure adherence to coding standards.8. Continuous Learning:• Stay updated on the latest industry trends, technologies, and best practices.• Share knowledge and mentor junior developers within the team.Requirements:• Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.• Proven experience as a Full Stack Java Developer or similar role.• Strong proficiency in Java programming language and related frameworks (e.g., Spring, Hibernate).• Experience with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks (e.g., Angular, React, or Vue.js).• Proficient in database design and management using relational and/or NoSQL databases.• Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git).• Knowledge of RESTful API design and implementation.• Familiarity with containerization and deployment tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).• Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.• Ability to work collaboratively in a team and independently.Preferred:Spring, Spark, Java, REST Services, AWS• Master's degree in a relevant field.• Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).• Knowledge of microservices architecture.• Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools.• Certification in Java development is a plus. Thanks,Barla SantoshTechnical RecruiterE: Sbarla@gacsol.com www.gacsol.com‘Experts in Digitalization and Engineering - Enterprise 4.0’
